name: Trainsmission to Mars!
description:
Build a train system between the Martian colonies and defend it from the Martians!

How to Play:

WASD- Move the Camera

Left Click on Colonies- Build a Track (only 1 track can be built between each Colony. Left click again to add a turn in the track.)

Hold Right Click- Bring up the Build Menu

Release Right Click- Select a Blueprint

Resources are gathered when Trains drive over them.

Turrets are built on Tracks, and provided resources by Trains.

--------

Trainsmission to Mars is a Game Jam game made in 48 hours at WPI by Alexander 'Laugic' Hebert (Code) and Charlie 'Lionspride' Nungesser (Art)
